Name: Forge
Description:
Provide multi-level upgrade plan for all Protoss heroes.

Allow:
- Enable Probes warp Nexus Photon Cannon.

Root.Tooltip: Tap to see Artanis Pisonic Training Program.
Root.Name: Artanis : Psionic Training

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Tap to see Alarak Soul Absorbtion Program.
Root.Name: Alarak : Soul Draw

Root.Tooltip: Tap to see Fenix Purifier Armament Program.
Root.Name: Fenix : Purification Arm

Root.Tooltip: Tap to see Karax Phase Technology Program.
Root.Name: Karax : Phase Technology

Root.Tooltip: Tap to see Vorazun Pisonic Training Program.
Root.Name: Vorazun: Psionic Training

Root.Tooltip: Tap to see Rohana Khala's Will Program.
Root.Name: Rohanna : Khala's Will

Root.Tooltip: Research Spear of Adun's High Energy Power Field, increase heroes damage by 25%
Root.Name: Research Adun Field

Root.Tooltip: Increase the solar recovery rate of the Spear of Adun by 100%.
Root.Name: Research Solar Essence

Root.Tooltip: Gives the Spear of Adun two additional attacking abilities to gain additional effects. When a hero unit uses the corresponding special skill, Spear of Adun: Orbital Strikes its beacon will be directed to perform an additional precision bombing strike, while Spear of Adun: The Avengers summoned by the Vengeance Protocol will have powerful special effects based on the hero's next attack.
Root.Name: War Protocol

0002.Tooltip: Allows Artanis Lightning Charge to be stored three times and increases the maximum charge distance by 50%.
0002.Name: Psionic Training: Lightning Gallop

0002.Tooltip: Allows Wind of the Astral to restore 100 shields and 100 health for nearby friendly units.
0002.Name: Psionic Training: Astral Asylum

0002.Tooltip: Increases the stun effect of Lightning Charge on target units by 100%, and stunned units take an additional 50% damage.
0002.Name: Psionic Training: Thunder Strike

0002.Tooltip: Expand the scope of the Lightning Charge by 30%, and make the enemy units affected by the Lightning Charge radiate the Lightning Chain to a large range to continue to cause damage.
0002.Name: Psionic Training: Psionic Flush

0002.Tooltip: Reduced the 5 second cooldown of Astral Wind and the cooldown of Resuscitation by 50%, and increased the damage of Resuscitation Psionic Shock to 300 (vs. Armored 500).
0002.Name: Psionic Training: The Will of Aiur

0002.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0002.Name: Cancel

0003.Tooltip: Increases the effect of Alarak's Soul Breath by 50 Shield and 50 Health, and increases Alarak's maximum health and shield by 50%.
0003.Name: Soul Absorption: Soul Augmentation

0003.Tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Deadly Charge by 50%, and Deadly Charge deals 200 additional damage to 3 nearby units.
0003.Name: Soul Absorption: Fatal Devastation

0003.Tooltip: Increases the effect of Alarak's Soul Breath by 50 Shield and 50 Health, and increases Alarak's maximum health and shield by 50%.
0003.Name: Soul Absorption: Soul Enhancement

0003.Tooltip: Unlocks Alarak's range attacks and the ability to stun the unit. At the same time, Alarak will continuously increase the attack speed and movement speed after performing soul absorption.
0003.Name: Soul Absorption: Chaotic Absorption

0003.Tooltip: Increases the direct damage of Deadly Charge by 100% and increases the lightning damage it deals by 300.
0003.Name: Soul Absorption: Bane Blades

0003.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0003.Name: Cancel

0004.Tooltip: Make Fenix unlock the Shield Battery ability. Fenix's shield is fully restored and automatically released to recover when the shield disappears.
0004.Name: Purifier Armament: Reconstruction Barrier

0004.Tooltip: Increase Fenix's maximum shield by 200 and his armor by 3. Meanwhile, Fenix can continuously self-repair.
0004.Name: Purifier Armament: Heavy Armor

0004.Tooltip: Increase the stun time of Shock Charge by 100%, and make Fenix use the Shock Charge to cause enemy units in a large area to panic and walk around.
0004.Name: Purifier Armament: Purifier Deterrence

0004.Tooltip: When Fenix releases the Shield Charger and Shock Charge, units will be attracted to Fenix, and each time the Shield Charger is released, it will increase Fenix 2 armor for 60 seconds.
0004.Name: Purifier Armament: Blackhole Force Field

0004.Tooltip: Reduces Fenix damage taken by 30% and reduces the cooldown of the Shield Charger by 50%.
0004.Name: Purifier Armament: Critical Shield

0004.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0004.Name: Cancel

0005.Tooltip: Reduce cooldown of psionic storm by 10 seconds, and increase its cast range by 50%.
0005.Name: Khala's Will : Psionic Perfusion

0005.Tooltip: Psionic Storm will reduce attack speed and movement speed of targte units, making them to attack each other.
0005.Name: Khala's Will : Chaos Storm

0005.Tooltip: Increases the damage done by Psionic Storm by 100%.
0005.Name: Khala's Will: Psionic Aggregation

0005.Tooltip: Units killed by Psionic Storm will explode and deal aoe damage. This will also pass Psionic Storm to the affected units and deal some amount of damage.
0005.Name: Khala's Will: Judgement Storm

0005.Tooltip: Increases the range of psionic storms by 25%, and causes units that are out of psionic storms and their effects to continue to take damage for a period of time.
0005.Name: Khala's Will：Tempest Adoption

0005.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0005.Name: Cancel

0006.Tooltip: Increase the range of Shadow Dash by 150% and reduce its cooldown. In addition, after Vorazun cast Shadow Dash, grant Vorazun 2 sceconds invulnerablity and 100% movement speed boost, and take away the vision of enemy unit along the pathways.
0006.Name: Psionic Training: Shadow Pass

0006.Tooltip: Increase Shadow Sickle weapon damage by 70 and Shadow Fury's damage from 60 to 100.
0006.Name: Psionic Training: Shadow Strike

0006.Tooltip: After Vorazun cast Shadow Dash, remove the cooldown of Shadow Fury.
0006.Name: Psionic Training: Dark Samsara

0006.Tooltip: Vorazun's attack can apply the "Psionic Burst" effect to enemy units to continue to take damage. Your hero units' attacks will gradually increase the damage caused by "Psionic Burst". When this effect is accumulated to a certain level, "Psionic Burst Burst "damage will be greatly increased.
0006.Name: Psionic Training: Shadow Blast

0006.Tooltip: Each enemy unit died will reduce cooldown of shadow dash by 0.5 seconds. If it is killed by Vorazun, cooldown reduction will increase to 2 seconds. Vorazun's each attack will also reduce shadow dash by 1 second.
0006.Name: Psionic Training: Dark Absorption

0006.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0006.Name: Cancel

0007.Tooltip: Increased the maximum number of charges for Recycling from 1 to 3 and reduced the 5 second cooldown.
0007.Name: Phase Technology: Rapid Reclamation

0007.Tooltip: Unlock Karax's ability to provide 100 additional shield points for ally unit. Meanwhile, Photon Cannon can provide a mini shield for ally unit which can 50 points of damage in short time.
0007.Name: Phase Technology: Phase Shield

0007.Tooltip: Increase the maximum charges of Reclamation and Phase Shield by 2, and Phase Cannon by 3.
0007.Name: Phase Technology: Dilatation

0007.Tooltip: Increase armor of ally units within Karax's energy field by 4, and restore 4% of maximum health and shield.
0007.Name: Phase Technology: Phase Field

0007.Tooltip: When a unit controlled by Reclamation is dead, it will transfer Reclamation effect to a nearby unit, and can transfer twice. Karax's Photon Cannon will also control a nearby unit when it is destroyed, but this unit cannot transfer this effect to others.
0007.Name: Phase Technology: Data Network

0007.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0007.Name: Cancel
